text: Matisia coloradorum is a species of plant in the family Malvaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests and subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== coloradorum Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Endangered plants Category:Endangered biota of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Matisia coloradorum
